strapiPost.title: Underground
strapiPost.content:
It really is time for the holiday fun to begin, because Undercroft has brought back Miracle on 2nd Street for its second annual run in Bentonville. 

  • Two spaces: Miracle is a speakeasy below The Preacher’s Son and is occupying its patio space as well throughout the season. The Preacher’s Son patio will be transformed into a winter wonderland, and Undercroft will be decked out in the Christmas theme we all love. 
  • Holiday magic: Miracle on 2nd Street is a “whimsical destination” ready with holiday drinks for everyone over 21. Guests who arrive will have access to both spaces so as to get the fullest experience. Reservations are open, so grab a slot!

Click HERE for more information.
